## Project Details
- **Name**: PicFlow
- **Type**: Vue 3 + TypeScript + Vite
- **Purpose**: Client-side image compression, conversion, resize, and optimization tool

## Features
- Image compression (JPG, PNG, WebP)
- Format conversion (PNG↔JPG↔WebP, SVG→PNG)
- Image resize with aspect ratio preservation
- EXIF metadata removal
- Batch processing
- Before/After preview
- Download processed images
